title: Manage Mine Rehabilitation
description: An environmental officer plans and monitors the rehabilitation of an old waste dump, which involves reshaping it and planting vegetation.

tasks.description: Develop a rehabilitation plan for the waste dump, specifying the final landform design and the types of native vegetation to be planted.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed rehabilitation plan is created.

tasks.description: Schedule a contractor to reshape the dump with dozers and cover it with topsoil.
tasks.expected_outcome: The earthworks for the rehabilitation are scheduled.

tasks.description: Monitor the growth of the vegetation over time using drone imagery to ensure the rehabilitation is successful.
tasks.expected_outcome: Drone surveys confirm that the vegetation is establishing successfully, meeting the closure criteria.
